info.title: Burki
info.description: A system that uses AI to answer customer Calls.

get.description: Health check endpoint for load balancers and monitoring.

post.description:
Generate TwiML for incoming Twilio calls.
This endpoint is called by Twilio when a call comes in.

Initiates an outbound call from an assistant to a specified phone number.
This endpoint is protected and requires authentication.

Handle Twilio recording status callbacks.
This endpoint is called by Twilio when a recording is completed or failed.

get.description: Landing page showcasing Burki Voice AI.
Dashboard page with essential analytics.
User profile page.
Organization settings page.
Display login page.

post.description: Handle manual login.
Handle Google OAuth login.

get.description: Display registration page.

post.description: Handle manual registration.
Handle Google OAuth registration.

get.description: Handle logout.
Display API keys management page.

post.description: Create a new API key.
Delete an API key.

get.description: List assistants with pagination, filtering, and sorting.
Show the create assistant form.

post.description: Create a new assistant.

get.description: View an assistant.
Show the edit assistant form.

post.description: Update an assistant.

get.description: Delete an assistant.
Export assistants data in CSV or JSON format.

post.description: Perform bulk actions on assistants.

Fetch available phone numbers from user's Twilio account.
This endpoint allows users to test their Twilio credentials and see available numbers.

get.description: Download or serve recording from S3.
Serve recording for in-browser audio player from S3.
Export call transcripts in various formats.
List calls with pagination, filtering, and sorting.
View a call with recordings, transcripts, chat messages, and webhook logs.
Export calls data in CSV or JSON format.

post.description: Perform bulk actions on calls.

get.description:
API Documentation page - publicly accessible.

Comprehensive documentation for the Burki Voice AI API,
including authentication, endpoints, examples, and code samples.
Redirect /api-reference to /docs for consistency.
Redirect /documentation to /docs for consistency.
Phone numbers management page.

post.description: Sync phone numbers from Twilio account.
Assign or unassign a phone number to/from an assistant.
Delete/deactivate a phone number.

get.description: Organization settings page including Twilio configuration.

post.description: Update organization's Twilio credentials.

Create a new assistant.

Creates a new voice assistant with the specified configuration.
The assistant will be associated with the authenticated user's organization.

get.description:
Get a list of assistants for your organization.

Returns all assistants that belong to your organization,
with optional filtering by status and creator.

parameters.name: limit

schema.description: Maximum number of items to return
schema.title: Limit

parameters.description: Maximum number of items to return

parameters.name: my_assistants_only

schema.description: Only return assistants created by me
schema.title: My Assistants Only

parameters.description: Only return assistants created by me

schema.title: Response Get Assistants Api V1 Assistants Get

get.description: Get the count of assistants in your organization.

schema.title: Response Get Assistants Count Api V1 Assistants Count Get

get.description:
Get a specific assistant by ID.

Returns the assistant details if it belongs to your organization.

put.description:
Update an assistant.

Updates the assistant configuration if it belongs to your organization.
Only the fields provided in the request will be updated.

delete.description:
Delete an assistant.

Permanently deletes the assistant if it belongs to your organization.
This action cannot be undone.

get.description:
Get a specific assistant by phone number.

Returns the assistant details if it belongs to your organization.
Uses the new PhoneNumber table for lookups.

patch.description:
Update the active status of an assistant.

Quick endpoint to activate or deactivate an assistant.

parameters.name: is_active

schema.description: Whether to activate or deactivate the assistant
schema.title: Is Active

parameters.description: Whether to activate or deactivate the assistant

get.description:
Get information about your organization.

Returns basic organization information for the authenticated user.

schema.title: Response Get My Organization Info Api V1 Assistants Me Organization Get

get.description:
Get list of supported LLM providers.

Returns the available LLM providers and their default configurations.

schema.title: Response Get Supported Llm Providers Api V1 Assistants Providers Get

get.description:
Get all phone numbers assigned to a specific assistant.

Returns a list of phone numbers currently assigned to the assistant.

schema.title: Response Get Assistant Phone Numbers Api V1 Assistants  Assistant Id  Phone Numbers Get

post.description:
Assign a phone number to an assistant.

Assigns the specified phone number to the assistant.
The phone number must belong to your organization and not be assigned to another assistant.

Unassign a phone number from an assistant.

Removes the phone number assignment from the assistant.
The phone number will remain in your organization but won't route calls to any assistant.

get.summary: Get Available Phone Numbers For Assistant
get.description:
Get all unassigned phone numbers that can be assigned to an assistant.

Returns phone numbers in your organization that are not currently assigned to any assistant.

schema.title: Response Get Available Phone Numbers For Assistant Api V1 Assistants  Assistant Id  Available Phone Numbers Get

post.description:
Assign multiple phone numbers to an assistant at once.

Assigns all specified phone numbers to the assistant.
Returns success if all assignments succeed, or details about failures.
Upload a document to an assistant's knowledge base.

get.description: List documents for an assistant.

delete.description: Delete a document from an assistant's knowledge base.

get.description: Get processing status of a document.

post.description:
Assign a phone number to an assistant by phone number string.

Auto-syncs from Twilio if the number doesn't exist locally and auto_sync is True.
This is the recommended way to assign newly purchased Twilio numbers.

Args:
    assistant_id: ID of the assistant to assign the phone number to
    request: JSON request containing phone_number, friendly_name (optional), and auto_sync
Unassign a phone number from an assistant by phone number string.

Sync phone numbers from Twilio to local database.

This will import any new phone numbers from your Twilio account
that aren't already in the local database.

get.description:
List all phone numbers in your organization.

Returns phone numbers with their assignment status and assistant information.

parameters.name: include_assigned

schema.description: Include phone numbers assigned to assistants
schema.title: Include Assigned

parameters.description: Include phone numbers assigned to assistants

schema.title: Response List Organization Phone Numbers Api V1 Assistants Organization Phone Numbers Get

get.description: List phone numbers available for assignment (not assigned to any assistant).

schema.title: Response List Available Phone Numbers Api V1 Assistants Organization Phone Numbers Available Get

get.description:
Get a list of calls for your organization.

Returns all calls that belong to assistants in your organization,
with comprehensive filtering options.

parameters.name: limit

schema.description: Maximum number of items to return
schema.title: Limit

parameters.description: Maximum number of items to return

parameters.name: date_from

schema.description: Filter calls from this date (ISO format)
schema.title: Date From

parameters.description: Filter calls from this date (ISO format)

parameters.name: date_to

schema.description: Filter calls to this date (ISO format)
schema.title: Date To

parameters.description: Filter calls to this date (ISO format)

schema.title: Response Get Calls Api V1 Calls  Get

get.description:
Export calls data in CSV or JSON format.

Returns call data with the specified filters applied.

Get detailed call analytics for your organization.

Returns comprehensive metrics and trends for the specified period.
Get the count of calls in your organization with filtering options.

Get a specific call by ID.

Returns the call details if it belongs to an assistant in your organization.

Get a specific call by Twilio Call SID.

Returns the call details if it belongs to an assistant in your organization.

patch.description:
Update the metadata for a specific call.

This allows you to store custom information against a call record.
The new metadata will be merged with any existing metadata.

get.description:
Get all transcripts for a call.

Returns transcripts if the call belongs to an assistant in your organization.

schema.title: Response Get Call Transcripts Api V1 Calls  Call Id  Transcripts Get

get.description: Export call transcripts in various formats.

Get all transcripts for a call by Twilio Call SID.

Returns transcripts if the call belongs to an assistant in your organization.

schema.title: Response Get Call Sid Transcripts Api V1 Calls Sid  Call Sid  Transcripts Get

get.description:
Get all recordings for a call.

Returns recordings if the call belongs to an assistant in your organization.

schema.title: Response Get Call Recordings Api V1 Calls  Call Id  Recordings Get

get.description:
Get all recordings for a call by Twilio Call SID.

Returns recordings if the call belongs to an assistant in your organization.

schema.title: Response Get Call Sid Recordings Api V1 Calls Sid  Call Sid  Recordings Get

get.description:
Get call statistics for your organization.

Returns various metrics about calls in your organization.

Search calls by various criteria.

Searches through call SIDs, customer phone numbers, and assistant names.

schema.title: Response Search Calls Api V1 Calls Search Get
